title: Webmin CRLF Injection Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Webmin. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of CGI requests. The issue results from the lack of proper neutralization of CRLF sequences. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of root.
timeline:
2025-02-28 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-05-01 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-05-01 - Advisory Updated
